This is a survey of the technical algebraic devices which are used in the local study of an algebraic variety in the neighbourhood of one of its points or of a subvariety. These devices have been developed by various authors:
W Krull

O Zariski

This little book contains, in a condensed form, an encyclopedic repertorium of almost everything which is known on the subject. Sufficient indications of the proofs are given to make it easy to reconstruct them entirely. The nature of the applications of the various theorems to
